snippet.title: inVokeR official trailer
snippet.description:
inVokeR is a one versus one wizard dueling game for VR platforms. Challenge your friends in strategic magic combat, casting spells to turn the tide of battle!

View inVokeR's Steam page here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/627070/inVokeR/

• Cast a combination of offensive and defensive Spells to gain the advantage!
• Prove yourself in online mode to become the ultimate archmage!
• Play with friends in private matches!
• Fight against random players in public matches!
• Hone your skills in offline mode by training against an AI in multiple difficulties!
• Perfect your aim and spellcasting in three Target Break Time Attack modes!
• Challenge yourself and test your skill against the Boss Trial!
• Free practice target break mode available while waiting for players so you can practice while you wait!
• Multiple fantasy battle stages to choose from!

Optimized for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift

8thshore.com
© 2017 8th Shore, Inc.
